text: "UHF" is an original song by "Weird Al" Yankovic. It is a style parody of The Jacksons song State of Shock written by Michael Jackson and Randy Hansen, combined with a style parody of themes that are played to advertise television stations. It was the theme of the movie UHF. Category:"Weird Al" Yankovic songs Category:1989 songs
title: UHF (song)
